data.name: AccountLockedTooManyAttempts
data.value: Your account has been locked for {0} minutes due to exceeding {1} invalid password attempts.\n\nPlease try again later, or contact {2} if any questions.

data.name: ErrorBanned
data.value: You have been banned from using this app. Please contact us if any questions.

data.name: ErrorDoctorNotVerified
data.value: HCP has not been verified yet. Please contact us if any questions.

data.name: ErrorOldOrNewPasswordInvalid
data.value: The current password is incorrect or the new password is invalid

data.name: ErrorRegistrationUserAlreadyExists
data.value: This user already exists in the system. Please try another.

data.name: ErrorAccountAssociatedWithThirdParty
data.value: The email is associated with a third party account. Please login with your associated account instead

data.name: ErrorEmailNotRegistered
data.value: We could not find an associated email address and password. Please try again.

data.name: ErrorEmailNotVerified
data.value: This email address has not been verified. Please activate your account through the verification email.\n\nIf you can't find, please check spam/junk folder.

data.name: ErrorPhoneNotVerified
data.value: This phone number has not been verified. Please check your phone sms for OTP code and activate your account through the verification process.

data.name: ErrorInvalidPassword
data.value: We could not find an associated email address and password. Please try again.

data.name: ErrorAgeRestriction
data.value: Users Under The Age of 18 Are Prohibited From Using This App or Service.

data.name: ErrorChangeThirdPartyPassword
data.value: As account is linked to a third-party, your password could not be changed.\n\nPlease login via third-party, or contact {0} if any questions.

data.name: ErrorEmailNull
data.value: Please fill in your email address.

data.name: ErrorEmailInvalidFormat
data.value: Invalid email address. Email address must be in the form of name@domain.com.

data.name: ErrorEmailTooLong
data.value: Invalid email address. Email address must be shorter than 450 characters.

data.name: ErrorPasswordInvalidFormat
data.value: Password must be at least 8 characters with alphanumeric, containing at least 1 lowercase letter (a-z), 1 uppercase letter (A-Z), and 1 number (0-9).

data.name: ErrorPasswordNull
data.value: Please fill in a password.

data.name: ErrorReferralCodeInvalid
data.value: This referral code is not valid. Please try another.

data.name: ErrorUserDeleted
data.value: This user has been deleted. Please contact us if any questions.

data.name: ErrorEmailAlreadyVerified
data.value: This account has already been verified.

data.name: ErrorEmailMismatch
data.value: Please use the same email address as your HOPE account.

data.name: ErrorFacebookLoginFailed
data.value: Invalid Facebook login. Please try again later.

data.name: ErrorHCPNotVerified
data.value: HCP has not been verified yet. Please contact us if any questions.

data.name: ErrorSessionExpired
data.value: Session expired. Please login again.

data.name: ErrorUserNotFound
data.value: User not found. Please check user ID or register to use our services.

data.name: ErrorUserUpdatedPassword
data.value: It seems you have updated your password. Please try logging in with your new password.

data.name: ErrorCorporateBanned
data.value: Your associated corporate has been banned. Please contact us if any questions.
